Articles.Content:
EDIT: Solved

Hey so I'm working on an IVA for a cockpit, but when I go to add props for RasterPropMonitor I get funky looking screens/displays and some of the other props don't work (navball, speed LCD, Indicator panel, B9 action group switches, etc).

Any idea what causes this? 

Example:

![DtYi03W.png](http://i.imgur.com/DtYi03W.png)

Mods I am using (not many)

![YItIPY6.png](http://i.imgur.com/YItIPY6.png)
